definition: system/to control/to regulate/variant of 製|制[zhi4]
to do/to grow/to write or compose/to pretend/to regard as/to feel/writings or works
to use/to employ/to have to/to eat or drink/expense or outlay/usefulness/hence/therefore

sentences.english: Conclusions Osteoclast-mediated bone resorption was inhibited by the bisphosphonate administration.
sentences.chinese: 結論雙膦酸鹽對破骨細胞性骨吸收有明顯的抑制作用。

sentences.english: This inhibiting effect was due chiefly to the concentration of combined nitrogen.
sentences.chinese: 化合態氮的抑制作用與濃度密切相關。

sentences.english: The circuit can restrain odd order harmonic distortion and common model disturbing signal.
sentences.chinese: 該電路具有對偶次諧波及共模干擾信號具有抑制作用。

sentences.english: The result showed that nanoscale silver has evidently inhibitory effects on testing bacteria.
sentences.chinese: 結果表明，納米銀對供試菌種有較爲明顯的抑制作用。

sentences.english: However, it appears as much of this inhibitory ability develops only postnatally .
sentences.chinese: 然而，這種抑制作用似乎更多是在出生後出現。

sentences.english: Using dilution-plate method, the inhibiting effect to the bacteria of the vanillin was determined.
sentences.chinese: 用稀釋平板法測定了香蘭素對細菌的抑制作用。

sentences.english: Objective To study the anti-tumor activity of Phellinus linteus.
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察桑黃幾種有效成分對腫瘤的抑制作用。

sentences.english: The inhibitory effect increased with the enhanced contents of the vegetable homogenate.
sentences.chinese: 生菜漿較熟菜漿的抑制作用更強。

sentences.english: For proliferation inhibit, the effect of gasoline exhaust is slightly greater than methanol exhaust.
sentences.chinese: 汽油車尾氣對細胞增殖的抑制作用略大於甲醇車尾氣。

sentences.english: The responses of tomato seedling to water stress using tensiometer were studied.
sentences.chinese: 水分脅迫對番茄幼苗的生長有嚴重的抑制作用。

sentences.english: Inhibition of allicin against Candida albicans in vitro was investigated.
sentences.chinese: 探討大蒜素對白色念珠菌生長的抑制作用。

sentences.english: On some strains of bacteria, it has better effect in bacteriostasis than Kandfuxin.
sentences.chinese: 該液對多種細菌有抑制作用，其抑菌作用優於康復新。

sentences.english: Miejunxing hardly have no effects on pathogen.
sentences.chinese: 滅菌星對病原菌幾乎沒有抑制作用。

sentences.english: Evaluate the anti-action of Aprotinin in ischemic brain edema.
sentences.chinese: 評價抑肽酶對缺血性腦水腫的抑制作用。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To study the therapeutic effects of Tongbi capsule on allergic rhinitis in guinea pigs.
sentences.chinese: 探討通鼻膠囊對豚鼠變態反應性鼻炎的抑制作用。

sentences.english: So the seeds vigor, growing development and photosynthetic characteristics were analyzed.
sentences.chinese: 由此認爲航天搭載誘變對小桐子種子活力有抑制作用。

pinyin: huang2 tong2 lei4 hua4 he2 wu4

definition: to act on/to affect/action/function/activity/impact/result/effect/purpose/intent/to play a role/corresponds to English -ity, -ism, -ization/CL:個|个[ge4]
histamine (a biogenic amine involved in local immune responses)
